title: Bacon, cheese and sun-dried tomato puff pastry plait
ingredients: ['1 packet (500g) frozen puff pastry, thawed', '30g grated Gouda cheese', '85g bacon, cooked and cubed', '1 1/2 tablespoons finely chopped sun-dried tomatoes', '2 tablespoons sliced black olives', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 egg, beaten', '1 teaspoon mixed herbs']
